title: Cute Formatter
description: This website solves the problem of quickly turning rough notes or plans into shareable, styled documents, helping content creators, designers, and developers who need presentable documentation or marketing assets.

title: Merchant Payment Integration API
description: Built a full REST API suite handling transactions, refunds, and settlements with Spring Boot and MySQL. Clean layered architecture and Swagger docs for seamless team collaboration.

title: Tech Skill Tracker
description: solves simple portfolio/skill inventory management for individual developers or small teams, enabling CRUD operations, auth-protected project management, and containerized local deployment.

title: Clickstream Analytics Pipeline
description: Built a real-time clickstream pipeline using Kafka to track and analyze user engagement across simulated web events.

title: Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: Created a classification model achieving 82% accuracy to predict customer churn using structured telecom data.

title: Real-Time Market Data Feed Pipeline

title: Order Event Processing System
description: Developed an end-to-end e-commerce event pipeline using Kafka, PostgreSQL, FastAPI, and Grafana for real-time order tracking and analytics.
